posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
I just got back a few autographed T205 and T206 cards from JSA/BVG this afternoon and will be listing them on ebay Saturday night.  If you'd like to make an offer on one or more of them prior to then, please send me an email to:  SignedT206@gmail.com



The cards include:

T205
Davy Jones
Fred Snodgrass
Larry Doyle
Al Bridwell
Tommy Leach
Fred Parent

T206
Doyle Batting
Davy Jones

Click slide show to see images up close (the Cobb is not for sale!)
